vote.title: A resolution (1) declaring four properties unwanted and unneeded, and authorizing their advertisement for sale by public auction (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet); (2) establishing a reserve for the auctioned surplus properties; (3) authorizing a Purchase and Sale Agreement to be prepared for the auctioned surplus properties receiving highest qualified bid that meets or exceeds the reserve; and (4) authorizing the conveyance of a deed in a form acceptable to City Attorney - Estimated Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($799,082.40) and General Fund ($30,000.00)
